parameters.price: Price of a mean for two, with drinks, in US $.
parameters.east: Indicator variable for location of the restaurant. 0 = west of 5th Avenue, 1 = east of 5th Avenue

reference: For each category the scales are as follows:
title: nyc
description:
Description
Zagat is a public survey where anyone can provide scores to a restaurant.
The scores from the general public are then gathered to produce ratings.
This dataset contains a list of 168 NYC restaurants and their Zagat Ratings.
format: A data frame with 168 observations on the following 6 variables.
